item.title: Kernel updated don´t update grub on Centos 6.4
item.description: So you have updated the kernel on you centos but you server is still running on the old kernel. Whenan kernel is updated yum updates the file /etc/grub.conf and that is an synlink to /boot/grub/grub.conf but if the link is broken then you will have two grub.conf. One /etc/grub.conf and one /boot/grub/grub.conf and then when you update en kernel the server will still not run on the new kernel.
